TopicTitle: A few ways to make KSP run smoothly and majorly reduce lag :)

Articles.Content:
This is my first tutorial video

what you guys think?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FYolxj41KXM&feature=youtu.be

Tl;dr:

You show off Reddit, the KSP Forums and fail to activate fallback part shaders.
>The video has been removed by the user
Removed it because people were telling me to go kill my self

Hmm, well that's not a nice thing to say... I just don't get the hostility on youtube. I mean do these people just sit at their computers all day waiting for videos to post so they can say hateful things? (not to get off topic or anything)

You have to learn that when you post things online for all to see, some of those seeing it will be idiots, morons and a-holes. It's just the nature of the beast. The best you can do is ignore them and relish in the fact that you don't live the obviously miserable lives they do.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Well this thread seems to have run its course and can go no further so it's time it was closed, also Nori, yes, yes they do.
